articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Paektusan Architectural Institute
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Paektusan Architectural Institute
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the Paektusan Architectural Institute.
					 He went round the room for the education in the revolutionary history, the room preserving historical data and relics and the room dedicated to history of the institute.
					
					 Watching photos of leader Kim Jong Il giving on-the-spot guidance to the institute with deep emotion, he said the valuable historical materials show the history of leadership provided by Kim Jong Il over the development of the Juche-oriented architecture.
					
					 Noting that without the guidance given by Kim Jong Il to the work for building with much effort such architectural creative study bases as the Paektusan Architectural Institute and clearly indicating the orientation of developing the Juche-oriented architecture, the greatest heyday and prosperity of construction on this land would be hardly thinkable, he stressed that Kim Jong Il's feats should always be remembered.
					
					 Going around the exhibition of architectural sci-tech achievements, the room for the study of architectural designs, the information study room and other places, he set forth the tasks before the institute.
					
					 The officials, designers, architects and researchers of the institute should firmly equip themselves with our party's idea of the Juche-oriented architectural beauty and construction policy and wage a dynamic drive to erect buildings to shine long along with the era of the Workers' Party and the structures strictly based on the Juche character, national character, originality and modern style, he said.
					
					 Architecture means high-level art and an important yardstick showing civilization level of the nation and national power, he noted, adding that designers and architects should fully ensure the designs at the highest level reflecting the party's construction idea and people's ideal with high awareness that they are artists and gardeners who visualize and carve out the rosy future of the socialist country.
					
					 He called on the designers, architects and researchers to thoroughly reject similarity and repetition in architectural designing and work hard to more successfully build a greater number of buildings for health, green ones, zero energy and zero carbon ones and multi-functional structures, etc.
					
					 He underscored the need for the institute to direct big efforts to the work for maximizing the proportion of locally available finishing building materials, making building materials diversified, increasing their varieties and producing multi-colored ones, exploring new areas in architecture, raising the creative skill of designers and architects and accumulating more data on world architecture.
					
					 Underlining the necessity to further update the designing means at the institute, he was so kind as to promise it that the party would send modern designing means including latest computers to it so that it may ensure the scientific accuracy, correctness and speed in designing at a high level.
					
					 Noting that the party has a very great expectation for the institute, he expressed expectation and belief that its officials, designers, architects and researchers would creditably discharge their heavy yet honorable mission and duty. Then he had a photo session with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by Ma Won Chun, director of the Designing Department of the State Affairs Commission.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to PM of Italy
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to PM of Italy
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Wednesday sent a message of sympathy to Matteo Renzi, prime minister of Italy, in connection with a train accident in Italy that caused heavy casualties.
					 The message expressed deep sympathy and consolation to the prime minister and the government of Italy, the victims and bereaved families on behalf of the government of the DPRK.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a message of sympathy to Paolo Gentiloni, minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of Italy, on the same day.

articles.title: Congratulations to Malian Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations to Malian Foreign Minister
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Abdoulaye Diop on his stay in office as minister of Foreign Affairs, African Integration and International Cooperation of Mali.
					 Expressing belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would steadily grow strong, the message wished the foreign minister greater success in his work.

articles.title: U.S. Forces Accused of Turning DMZ along MDL into Zone Flush with Heavy Weapons
articles.content:
U.S. Forces Accused of Turning DMZ along MDL into Zone Flush with Heavy Weapons
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Panmunjom Mission of the Korean People's Army Thursday gave an answer to the question raised by Joson Inmingun newspaper as regards the fact that the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea recently massively introduced various type heavy weapons into the Demilitarized Zone (DMZ) along the Military Demarcation Line (MDL), pushing the situation there to the phase of conflict and war.
					 On July 10 south Korean media made public the fact that the "UN Command" held a confab with the puppet Joint Chiefs of Staff in July 2014 and revised the "UN Command Regulation 551-4" on allowing the introduction of not only firearms but heavy weapons into the DMZ along the MDL and has begun implementing it since September 5 of the same year.
					
					 It is said that according to the new "regulation", 12.7mm-caliber machine gun, 40mm-caliber grenade launchers, 57mm-caliber recoilless gun, 81mm-caliber mortars and other heavy weapons were deployed into the DMZ, counting only those opened to public. 
					
					 The spokesman said:
					
					 Such undisguised breach of the Armistice Agreement has turned the DMZ into a "heavily armed zone" and pushed the situation to the phase of unpredictable military clash. This is a product of the ceaseless U.S. moves to ignite another Korean war, 
					
					  The U.S. imperialist aggression forces which are present in south Korea under the cloak of the "UN Command" are misleading the public opinion with sheer sophism that their shameless actions are "to cope with" the DPRK's "arms build-up."
					
					 The U.S. has long wantonly and totally breached the Korean Armistice Agreement.
					
					 It was the robber-like U.S. that began breaching the core provisions of the AA as soon as it was signed.
					
					 Military tension has reached an extreme phase in the DMZ along the MDL, the line dividing the Korean peninsula recognized as the biggest hotspot in the world. This is attributable to the dangerous phase of confrontation and war created by the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea by massively introducing heavy weapons to the DMZ along the MDL in wanton violation of the AA.
					
					 The massive introduction of heavy weapons into the DMZ along the MDL would render the DMZ which plays the role of military buffer zone defunct and turn it into an outpost for igniting a war. 
					
					 This is the aim sought by the chieftains of aggression and provocation. 
					
					 The U.S., the shameless robber and ferocious aggressor without an equal in the world, has paid lip-service to the "observance of the AA" and "detente" in a bid to hide its true colors. It is trying to turn the DMZ into "zone flooded with heavy weapons," thus inciting the military confrontation between the north and the south and rendering the situation there extremely tense.
					
					 By nature, it is the customary practice of the U.S. to abet and stoke dispute and conflict among nations and countries in a bid to achieve its aggressive purpose with ease.
					
					 This is well illustrated by the fact that the U.S. is stepping up the "transfer of its aggressor bases to areas south of the River Han."
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group of traitors is working with bloodshot eyes to escalate the confrontation with the compatriots in the north, zealously pursuant to this sinister scenario of the U.S.
					
					 The increased efforts on the part of the criminals to falsify facts and distort the reality would only bring to light their despicable true colors.
					
					 The KPA is now following with high vigilance the frequent ill-boding military moves of the enemy in areas along the MDL.

articles.title: CPRC Spokesman Denounces S. Korea's Decision on THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
CPRC Spokesman Denounces S. Korea's Decision on THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Now all Koreans are trembling with towering anger at the Park Geun Hye group which made a decision to introduce THAAD into south Korea from the U.S.
					 South Koreans of different social standings condemn the decision as an "act done by modern day five traitors," "fatal and ruinous option" and "great disaster bringing bigger threat than a war to people's security" as it is little short of selling off the sovereignty to the U.S. They are strongly demanding the nullification of the decision.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Park group, remaining unperturbed, is making desperate efforts to cover up its crimes and escape criticism at home and abroad while spouting out absurd sophism that "it is to cope with nuclear and missile threat from the north" and "it is an inevitable measure for safety, destiny and existence of people," said a spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country of the DPRK (CPRC) in a statement Thursday. 
					
					 It continued: 
					
					 The decision disclosed that Park Geun Hye is the rare traitor and a war servant obsessed with confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and keen on realizing a wild ambition for invading the north as she unhesitatingly sold off the destiny and interests of the nation and harassed regional peace and stability.
					
					 The CPRC bitterly denounces in the name of all Koreans the Park Geun Hye group of traitors for committing thrice-cursed act of treachery while kowtowing to the U.S. brigandish demand.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group's act of deploying THAAD is the heinous one for escalating confrontation with an aim to remove the treasured nuclear sword of the compatriots in the north, precious property of the nation, with the help of the wolf-like U.S.
					
					 Clear is the aim sought by Park Geun Hye in pressing for the deployment of THAAD despite the strong opposition of all Koreans and the international community.
					
					 It is the crafty scheme of Park Geun Hye to escalate the sanctions and pressure on the DPRK with the backing of the U.S. at any cost now that the position of the DPRK as a nuclear weapons state has been consolidated day by day and her trumpeting about the "north's denuclearization first" is becoming no longer workable.
					
					 Park Geun Hye is seriously mistaken if she thinks she can save her life interwoven with crimes and tide over her toppling ruling system with herself being hidden behind the U.S. THAAD.
					
					 Traitor Park Geun Hye, the very one behind the decision to deploy THAAD, must not forget even a moment that the DPRK's nuclear force for self-defense will be further bolstered up in quality and quantity and the merciless sword of justice will cut off her windpipe no matter how desperately she may try to stifle the compatriots in the north by clinging to the coattails of foreign forces. 
					
					 Park Geun Hye will have to pay most severely and most bitterly for her unpardonable treacherous act as she is leaving in history another record of despicable confrontation with compatriots in the north and submission to the U.S while offering the Korean peninsula to foreign forces as a theater of a nuclear war.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group's Pro-Japanese Act Assailed
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group's Pro-Japanese Act Assailed
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korean Committee on Measures for the Sexual Slavery for Japanese Army and Drafting Victims gave an answer to a question raised by KCNA Thursday as regards the disclosure of the pro-Japanese act of treachery committed by the Park Geun Hye group of south Korea to cover up the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 The spokesman said that the Park group recently slashed the authorities' funds for the registration of a record on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army at the UNESCO, sparking off a big public furor.
					
					 This is not only just an intolerable insult and mockery of the victims of the sexual slavery but a never-to-be pardoned act of treachery aimed to keep Japan's past crimes buried into oblivion, the spokesman said, and went on:
					
					 As there was a brisk movement among civic and social organizations of various countries around the world to register a record showing the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army in the wake of the registration of the bloody Nanjing massacre as a world heritage, the Japanese reactionaries have gone crafty in their moves to check the movement, talking about the possibility of suspending the contribution to UNESCO and the demand for the change of registration system of documentary heritages.
					
					 Taking advantage of such act against history being committed by Japan, Park is trying to nullify the crimes related to the sexual slavery which the successive puppet ruling forces of south Korea dared not do. This is the despicable sycophancy and treachery which can be committed only by Park as she has been steeped in pro-Japanese idea to the marrow of her bones since she was young when her father ruled and was raised in a "family" that served Japan risking anything.
					
					 The thrice-cursed sexual slavery committed by the Japanese imperialists can never be erased no matter how desperately the Park group may try to cover it up while going against the trend of the times.
					
					 The Park group will certainly be forced to pay for its acts of serving Japan.
					
					 The committee will always stand by the south Korean people in their just actions to let the world public know about Japan's past crimes and to make sure that such crimes are never repeated.

articles.title: Delegation of Academy of Social Sciences Leaves for China
articles.content:
Delegation of Academy of Social Sciences Leaves for China
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Academy of Social Sciences led by Vice President So Kwang Ung left here Thursday to visit China.

articles.title: DPRK Wrestlers Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Wrestlers Back Home
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK wrestlers returned home on Thursday after taking part in the 2016 Asian Junior Wrestling Championship.
					 The championship held in Thaipei of China from July 7 to 10 brought together more than 300 boy and girl wrestlers from 19 countries and regions including the DPRK, Mongolia and Iran. 
					
					 Won Myong Gyong won a gold medal in the women's wrestling 40kg category event and Kim Myong Su in the men's freestyle wrestling 42kg category event.
					
					 Hwang Un Hui bagged a silver medal in the women's wrestling 43kg category event and Han Hyon Song and Jo Sun Chol won bronze medals in the men's freestyle wrestling 46kg category event and in the men's Greco-roman wrestling 42kg category event respectively.

articles.title: European Regional Preparatory Committee for Joint Conference Formed
articles.content:
European Regional Preparatory Committee for Joint Conference Formed
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Korean residents in Europe met in Berlin on July 5 at which they released a statement supporting the proposal for a great national conference and formed the European regional preparatory committee for the successful holding of a great national conference, according to the press release issued on July 14 by the north side preparatory committee for a joint conference of all parties, organizations and individual personages of the north and the south and abroad for the peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula.
					 The European regional preparatory committee consists of overseas compatriots' organizations and individual personages.
					
					 Those organizations are the European Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany, the European Regional Headquarters of the Overseas Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, etc.
					
					 In addition to the above-said bodies and personages, several compatriots' bodies and individual personages in different countries of Europe have applied for joining the European regional preparatory committee.

articles.title: Unha Guidance Bureau Marks Its 40th Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
Unha Guidance Bureau Marks Its 40th Founding Anniversary
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The Unha Guidance Bureau marked its 40th founding anniversary on Thursday.
					 The bureau is one of the major trading organs in the DPRK for development of light industry and improvement of the people's living standard under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. Operating garment factories across the country, it has played a big role in carrying out the popular policies of the party and state.
					
					 Kim Il Sung took such a revolutionary measure as making sure that a new organ was formed to guide the garment trade of the country in a uniform way. He saw to it that the organ conducted production and trade independently and provided raw and other materials and funds for light industry.
					
					 Kim Jong Il indicated the principled problems and ways for the development of garment trade and led the bureau to reorganize the work system so that it might serve the purpose of improving the standard of people's living. 
					
					 The bureau has grown into a huge garment producer with competent technicians and strong production groundwork and a militant and powerful group devotedly carrying out the party's trade policies and light industry policy under the leadership of the party and the leaders over the past four decades.
					
					 There took place a meeting to mark the founding anniversary
					
					 It was attended by An Jong Su, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials and employees of the bureau.

articles.title: Pyongyang Information Technology Bureau Marks Its 30th Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
Pyongyang Information Technology Bureau Marks Its 30th Founding Anniversary
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Information Technology Bureau marked its 30th founding anniversary.
					 It has played a vanguard role in developing the nation's IT industry and has an important mission to perform in building a knowledge-based economic power.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il paid attention to the work of the bureau, indicated the orientation and ways of developing IT on an independent foundation and inspired its scientists and technicians to make an uninterrupted leap forward.
					
					 The bureau, founded on July 15, Juche 75 (1986), has grown to be a dependable IT center equipped with competent IT talents and modern research facilities under the leadership of the party and the leaders for the past 30 years. By combining scientific research with production it has made a great contribution to putting the national economy on IT basis.
					
					 The meeting to mark the founding anniversary took place on Thursday. It was attended by Choe Thae Bok, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials and employees of the bureau.

articles.title: Social Scientists Meet
articles.content:
Social Scientists Meet
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Symposium of the field of social science on the historical significance of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) took place at the Academy of Social Sciences Thursday.
					 The participants heard papers scientifically and theoretically proving the significance of the congress.
					
					 The speakers said that the congress provided a new landmark for fully displaying the might of the WPK successfully carrying forward the independent revolutionary line and methods of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and for accomplishing the cause of building of a socialist power under the uplifted banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and increasing the leadership role of the party.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un's report to the Seventh Congress of the WPK on the work of the Central Committee serves as important guidelines as it solemnly declared the supreme programme of the WPK for the accomplishment of the cause of people's independence, the cause of socialism under the banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and set the high goal of building a socialist power and the strategic line of attaining it, they noted, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Un indicated the goal of building a socialist power and the road for carrying it out with his rare ideological and theoretical wisdom, making it possible for the service personnel and people of the DPRK to wage an all-people general offensive, all-out death-defying campaign.
					
					 When social scientists fully prove the scientific accuracy and validity of the idea and line set forth at the congress and dynamically conduct theoretical information service to arouse all servicepersons and people to the drive for implementing them, their enthusiasm for general offensive would be raised remarkably and the final victory become faster.
					
					 Present there were Ri Hye Jong, president of the Academy of Social Sciences, officials, teachers, researchers, lecturers, journalists and editors in the fields of science, education, media and preservation of revolutionary relics.

articles.title: New Stamp Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamp Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued a stamp (one individual stamp) reflecting the atmosphere of the times when all the Korean people are out in the 200-day campaign of loyalty to carry out the decision made at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Seen on its upper part are letters reading "Let us all become honorable victors in the 200-day campaign!"
					
					 Depicted on the stamp is a builder calling on all people to display the honor of victors in the worthwhile drive for making a breakthrough in implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development through fresh dynamic Mallima speed campaign.

articles.title: Deep Attention Paid to Teenagers in DPRK
articles.content:
Deep Attention Paid to Teenagers in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- There took place a seminar themed "Investing in Teenage Girls" in Pyongyang on July 11 to mark World Population Day 2016. 
					 At the meeting, speakers referred to the DPRK government's investment in education, healthcare service and employment for teenagers as part of the efforts to implement the socio-economic development plan.  
					
					 Ulrika Rehnstrom Loi, UNFPA representative a.i. in the DPRK, said that it is an admirable thing that all teenagers study at schools in the DPRK. 
					
					 Sathyanarayana K.M., technical specialist of UNFPA in the DPRK, said all policies pursued by the DPRK for teenagers are very wonderful, expressing his satisfaction over the creditable implementation of the policies.
					
					 Ramon Jimenez Lopez, vice director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and chairman of the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea, said after seeing round the Okryu Children's Hospital that it was a world-standard health service center for children and it was as good as a palace rather than a hospital.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said in an article posted on its website that the Songdowon International Children's Camp, located in the east coastal area of the DPRK, was one of attractions in the DPRK that regards children as a king of the country.

articles.title: Compound Heat Insulator Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Compound Heat Insulator Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- In the DPRK, compound heat insulator made from city waste has been introduced into the construction.
					 The waste polystyrene foamed plastics are being used to make the insulator, developed by the City Management Research Institute under the State Academy of Sciences.
					
					 The institute also established a process for mass-producing this insulator, an environment-friendly building material, with its own efforts and technology.
					
					 According to Kim Chang Su, a section chief of the institute, the compound heat insulator, with low production cost, was applied to building a hotel for scientists at Sci-Tech Complex and other projects.
					
					 The DPRK pays big efforts to building environment-friendly and energy-saving buildings.

articles.title: Power Output Goes Up in DPRK
articles.content:
Power Output Goes Up in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The electric-power production is going up in the DPRK this month.
					 The Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex has produced hundreds of thousands more KWh everyday from the outset of July after carrying out its first half-yearly quota 105.9 percent.
					
					 The Pukchang Thermal Power Complex boosts the output of electricity considerably by updating equipment and facilities with home-made materials.
					
					 Such increased electric-power production was reported from Hochongang and Pujongang power stations.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Pyongyang City Power Distribution Station developed a program for control over the electric power system.
					
					 And coal mines across the country turned out over 50,000 more tons of coal than planned for thermal power stations in recent 35 days.

articles.title: U.S. Nuclear Threat Will Precipitate Its Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Nuclear Threat Will Precipitate Its Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Remarkable successes were made by the DPRK recently in bolstering the capability for national defence to cope with the ever-escalating moves of the U.S. imperialists to ignite a nuclear war.
					This clearly demonstrated once again to the U.S. imperialists and their followers making false propaganda about the nuclear deterrent of the DPRK that Songun Korea will blow up the bases of the hostile forces in a flash if they show even the slightest sign of provocation, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in a commentary.
					
					The commentary goes on:
					
					The U.S. is persistently insisting that it can never recognize the DPRK's access to nukes.
					
					Whether the enemies recognize or not, the DPRK has emerged as a nuclear power in the East to stand in the center of the international arena.
					
					It is the mettle of the DPRK to counter the U.S. moves for stifling it with the bolstering of its nuclear deterrent. The escalating hostile moves of the U.S. will result in a remarkable increase of the DPRK's capability for nuclear attack.
					
					The U.S. can never understand the will of the people of the DPRK all out in confrontation with the former.
					
					It is a foolish dream for the U.S. to think of denuclearizing the DPRK through military pressure, sanctions and blockade.
					
					The brigandish U.S. imperialists' move to browbeat the DPRK with nukes will only precipitate their ruin.
					
					They are staging a mad-cap war ruckus after bringing nuclear war hardware to south Korea and its vicinity, while crying out for mounting a preemptive strike at the DPRK and "toppling" it. But the service personnel and people of the DPRK who are single-mindedly united around their great leader remain unfazed by it.
					
					The nuclear war maniacs should correctly understand the powerful nuclear attack capability of the DPRK who has ranked itself among nuclear powers.

articles.title: U.S. Strategic Submarine Enters S. Korean Port
articles.content:
U.S. Strategic Submarine Enters S. Korean Port
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The U.S. strategic nuclear submarine Ohio entered Pusan Port of south Korea on Wednesday, according to the south Korean newspaper Kukmin Ilbo.
					 The submarine based at Washington had been forward-deployed on Guam. It has been deployed in south Korea in the wake of its portcall on Japan late in June.

articles.title: Drills for Detecting and Intercepting Submarine Ballistic Missiles Staged by U.S., Japan, S. Korea
articles.content:
Drills for Detecting and Intercepting Submarine Ballistic Missiles Staged by U.S., Japan, S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The U.S., Japan and south Korean puppet warmongers busy with the RIMPAC joint military exercises around Hawaii, kicked off a drill for detecting and intercepting submarine ballistic missiles of someone, according to the south Korean MBC on July 12.
					 The warmongers are mulling staging the drill for detecting and intercepting submarine ballistic missile, the first of its kind in history, whenever RIMPAC takes place.

articles.title: Shutdown of KIZ Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Shutdown of KIZ Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean emergency measure committee for Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) held a press conference on July 8 in protest against the unilateral shutdown of the KIZ by the puppet authorities, according to Yonhap News and MBC of south Korea.
					 The organization accused the "government" of evading the responsibility for the shutdown under this or that pretext, far from making compensation for the losses caused by it.
					
					 The south Korean emergency measure committee composed of representatives of the businesses involved in the KIZ held a meeting in Seoul on July 7 in protest against the puppet authorities' deceptive compensation.
					
					 It declared it would carry on its actions till the authorities compensate for the losses.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Make Decision to Improve Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Make Decision to Improve Inter-Korean Relations
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration held a joint press conference in Seoul Tuesday, urging the conservative authorities to make a decision to mend the north-south relations.
					 They accused the puppet regime of blocking even non-governmental exchanges.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The executive chairwoman of the Women Headquarters of the committee underlined the need for the Ministry of Unification to actively ensure the joint national event and football games of the workers in the south and the north for reunification and other non-governmental level exchanges, cooperation and events in order to improve the deteriorated inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The head of the group for external cooperation of the Media Headquarters of the committee demanded the authorities, the Minju Party and all other parties, organizations and individual personages of south Korea immediately come out for the formation of the south side preparatory committee for the joint conference.
					
					 The executive chairman of the Labor Headquarters of the committee urged the authorities to ensure non-governmental exchanges and cooperation so as to weather the crisis on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The deputy permanent representative of the Youth and Students Headquarters of the committee said that youth and students would take the lead in the struggle for peace and reunification.
					
					 At the end of the conference the representatives of the headquarters separately handed written demands addressed to the Ministry of Unification to the "government."

articles.title: Seoul Regional Organizations Call for Holding Joint Conference
articles.content:
Seoul Regional Organizations Call for Holding Joint Conference
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The Seoul Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and the Seoul Peace Meeting with attendance of 300 persons held a press conference in Seoul on July 12 calling for holding the joint conference of political parties, organizations and individual persons in the north, the south and abroad to prevent a war and achieve peace.
					 The organizations issued an action program for holding the great national conference for reunification.
					
					 They stressed in an appeal that the Park Geun Hye regime should not miss an opportunity to improve the south-north relations by ensuring the joint conference and various exchanges and cooperation between the south and the north and making practical proposals for resuming dialogue between authorities.
					
					 As determined at a meeting related to the inaugural ceremony of the Seoul Peace Meeting with attendance of 300 persons, the permanent organization in Seoul region, on June 11, they would stage actions on the basis of the movement for the resumption of non-governmental exchange and development of north-south relations and movement for regional exchange, the organizations said.

articles.title: S. Korean Civic Organization Protests against THAAD
articles.content:
S. Korean Civic Organization Protests against THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea on July 13 protested against the U.S. and the south Korean regime's decision to deploy THAAD.
					 The organization held a press conference in front of the building of the Defense Ministry of south Korea to denounce the military authorities for making public the decision to deploy THAAD in Songju of North Kyongsang Province.
					
					 It said that if THAAD is deployed, south Korea will be an outpost for defending the U.S. and Japan, its relations with the neighboring countries will get worse to increase the danger of war on the Korean peninsula and cause a new Cold War in Northeast Asia.
					
					 Stressing the living of residents in Songju of North Kyongsang Province will be destroyed, in particular, it urged the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to immediately withdraw the decision.
					
					 It said that it will carry on actions until the decision is cancelled.

articles.title: Residents in Songju County of S, Korea Protest against Decision of THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
Residents in Songju County of S. Korea Protest against Decision of THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Residents in Songju County, North Kyongsang Province of south Korea launched a protest action against the decision of THAAD deployment of the U.S. on Wednesday, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 When the puppet group decided to deploy THAAD in Songju County that day, the emergency measure committee of all county people against deployment of THAAD in Songju held a rally with the attendance of more than 5,000 residents and formed a delegation and paid a protest visit to the puppet Defense Ministry.
					
					 Members of the delegation handed over the protest letter signed by at least 25,000 residents, members of "assembly" and the county head to the vice-minister and demanded the minister clarify the reason behind the decision on THAAD deployment in Songju County.
					
					 They said THAAD deployment is not for the south Korean people but for defending the U.S. military bases.
					
					 Noting that the decision will bring immeasurable misfortune to the residents in Songju County, they demanded the withdrawal of the decision.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Called upon to Come out for Great National Conference for Reunification
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Called upon to Come out for Great National Conference for Reunification
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Ri Ku Yul, chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in the Far Eastern Region of the Russian Federation, made public a statement calling for coming out for a great national conference for reunification of the country and nation.
					 Recalling that the DPRK proposed to hold a great national conference for reunification to discuss the issue of independent reunification of the country after the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, the statement noted the compatriots in the Far Eastern region fully support the proposal.
					
					 The peaceful and independent reunification of Korea based on great national unity would help demonstrate the dignity and honor of the Korean nation to the whole world and bring peace and security to the Korean peninsula, it added.
					
					 It called on all the Korean organizations overseas to get united close for the reunification of the country and nation and take active part in the great national conference for reunification.

articles.title: Seminars on Works of Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un Held in Spain
articles.content:
Seminars on Works of Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un Held in Spain
 Pyongyang, 14 (KCNA) -- Seminars on works of leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un were held by the Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Vasco Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Spain on July 5 and 8 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The chief of the Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and other speakers explained the main contents of Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Hold the Great Leader in High Esteem Forever and Accomplish His Cause."
					
					 They praised Kim Il Sung as a great revolutionary, great man and benevolent father of the Korean people, saying that he will always be alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also other progressive peoples.
					
					 The chief and members of the Vasco Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in the seminar on Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" lauded Kim Il Sung as the eternal leader of the Korean people and the sun of Juche who provided a solid foundation for the successful advance and accomplishment of the cause of the Juche revolution.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Myanmar Personages
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Myanmar Personages
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Myanmar personages issued statements on July 4 and 7 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Tha Win, member of the Central Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar and secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the party, said that Kim Il Sung was the benevolent father of the people as he dedicated his whole life to the cause of freedom and emancipation of the people, adding that his undying feats are deeply cherished by the world progressive people.
					
					 Maung Maung Naying, director general of the Mit Tamor Publishing House of Myanmar, noted that Kim Il Sung set an excellent example for carrying out the cause of human independence by building socialism centered on the popular masses in the DPRK with his outstanding ideology and theory and great revolutionary practice.
					
					 The history knows no such a great man as the President who valued and loved the people, the general director said, adding:
					
					 Socialist Korea built by the President is the beacon of hope for the world progressive peoples.

articles.title: DPRK Turns into Invincible Power Thanks to Kim Il Sung: Thai Personage
articles.content:
DPRK Turns into Invincible Power Thanks to Kim Il Sung: Thai Personage
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, made public a statement on July 8, the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The President embarked on the road of revolution in his teens, founded the Juche idea reflecting the popular masses' desire for independence and the requirements of the times and wisely led the cause of liberating the country and building the party, army and state and the Fatherland Liberation War, thus performing undying feats for the country and its people, times and history, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK has turned into an invincible power thanks to Kim Il Sung who successfully applied the Juche idea to the revolution and construction and wisely led the popular masses.
					
					 The DPRK, once eclipsed in the international arena as a weak nation under colonial rule a century ago, is demonstrating its might as a politico-ideological power, military power, nuclear weapons state and satellite manufacturer and launcher. This is the shining fruition of his wise guidance.
					
					 I pay my highest regard to Comrade Kim Il Sung, the eternal leader of the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Russian, German Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Russian, German Figures
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Meetings for remembering President Kim Il Sung took place in Russia and Germany on July 5 and 6.
					 The first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union said:
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung is a distinguished state political activist in the 20th century recognized by the world.
					
					 He is the benefactor of the Korean nation who liberated the country from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and the founder of the party, state and army of the DPRK.
					
					 He built Korean-style socialism admired by the progressives by thoroughly applying independence to all fields of the revolution and construction.
					
					 Socialist Korea would be unthinkable apart from him.
					
					 The greatest of his feats is that he successfully solved the issue of succession to leadership.
					
					 He is always alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also other world progressives for his great exploits for the times and history.
					
					 The chairman of the Communist Party of Germany said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung made a great contribution to the cause of global independence.
					
					 Therefore, not only the Korean people but also other world progressive peoples are always remembering and revering him.
					
					 The works authored by him serve as encyclopedia giving clear-cut answers to all issues arising in accomplishing the cause of human independence, the cause of socialism.

articles.title: Syrian Media Praise Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Syrian Media Praise Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Syrian media in their special write-ups from June 30 to July 8 observed the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Syria TV Channel in a program praised the revolutionary career of the President who performed immortal exploits for the country and its people, the times and history, screening photos documenting revolutionary activities of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The SANA said that the idea and feats of Kim Il Sung are deeply cherished by the Korean people, introducing the fact that the President, who embarked on the road of revolution in his early years with an intention to build a new world for the people on the land of Korea, founded the Juche idea and the Songun idea, accomplished the historic cause of national liberation, enforced all democratic reforms and wisely led the building of a new society after the liberation of the country and honorably defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country in the 3-year war ignited by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The feats of the peerlessly great man who actively supported the struggle of the people of the countries aspiring after independence against imperialism are widely known as a vivid manifestation of his noble sense of obligation, it stressed.
					
					 The newspaper Tishrin in an article said that though more than 20 years have passed since the demise of the President, the Korean people are still holding him in high esteem as their eternal leader. The article praised him as a veteran statesman who worked as state leader for the longest time in the world.
					
					 The newspapers Al Baath and Al Thawrah and the Central Radio also praised the President.

articles.title: Venezuelan Bodies Introduce Kim Il Sung's Feats for Global Independence
articles.content:
Venezuelan Bodies Introduce Kim Il Sung's Feats for Global Independence
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Venezuela-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association jointly issued a bulletin on July 4 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "President Kim Il Sung and global independence" said that the President set forth an idea of making the whole world independent. It went on:
					
					 The President met many revolutionaries and resistance fighters across the world to teach them strategy and tactics on the struggle for national liberation in colonies and gave solution to all complicated problems raided by them and their bottlenecks.
					
					 He also rendered material aid and moral support to the people of the newly independent countries in their struggle for building a new society for global independence.
					
					 He figured out solution for the developing countries which were in agony of exploring a way of building a new society after gaining independence through national liberation struggle in colonies, on the basis of the experience in the DPRK.
					
					 It is one of his greatest exploits for global independence that he developed the non-aligned movement (NAM) and made great contributions to turning the NAM into a powerful independent force against imperialism.
					
					 He wisely led the world socialist movement to dynamically advance along the banner of independence in the tragic days of collapse of socialism in some countries.
					
					 The bulletin carried some photos of happy children in the DPRK.

articles.title: Foreign Personages Visit DPRK Missions
articles.content:
Foreign Personages Visit DPRK Missions
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Personages of various countries visited the DPRK missions in their countries on July 8, the 22nd demise anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the paintings depicting the President and leader Kim Jong Il standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They included the secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, the director of the Asia-Pacific Region International Relations Study Center in Khabarovsk, the chairperson and members of the Russian Khabarovsk Territorial Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and Experience in Socialist Construction of the DPRK, the general manager of the Samstroi Company of Russia, the vice-president of the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples and the director of its Asian Department, the first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, the chairman of the Supreme Council of the New Socialist Party of Romania, the chairman of the Socialist Party of Romania and the secretary general of the Romania-Korea Friendship Association.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Support Open Letter of Panmunjom Mission
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Support Open Letter of Panmunjom Mission
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on July 7 made public a joint statement expressing full support for the stand of the DPRK to mercilessly destroy the warmongers with invincible arms of Songun.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Panmunjom mission of the Korean People's Army in an open letter disclosed the military provocations committed in the area of the Military Demarcation Line by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet group.
					
					 Such military provocations as the "invasion of Mt. Songak", a prelude to the June 25 war in the 1950s, are escalating in the MDL area by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers.
					
					 They turned the demilitarized zone along the MDL into the outpost for invading the north.
					
					 Psychological warfare against the DPRK being staged by the south Korean puppet authorities has reached the extremity.
					
					 The prevailing grave situation in the MDL area reminds one of the eve of a war.
					
					 The open letter of the Panmunjom mission said that it is the invariable will of the DPRK army and people to remove the MDL, little different from a time bomb against the north, as early as possible and ensure durable peace and security on the Korean peninsula and achieve the great cause of national reunification.
					
					 It warned that if U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group unleash the second Korean war, they would certainly meet the most miserable end.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korea Will Only Face Bitter Defeat: British Newspaper
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korea Will Only Face Bitter Defeat: British Newspaper
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The July-August issue of the British newspaper Lalkar carried an article in the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The world peace-loving people set the period between June 25 and July 27 as the month of anti-U.S. joint struggle every year to express solidarity with the Korean people's just cause, the article said, adding:
					
					 The Korean war unleashed by the U.S. early in the 1950s was unprecedentedly fierce and severe.
					
					 It is entirely thanks to President Kim Il Sung's outstanding military ideas, strategy and tactics that the Korean people won a shining victory in the war.
					
					 Kim Il Sung was an anti-Japanese legendary hero, who defeated the Japanese imperialists through a resistance war against them, and an iron-willed commander who defeated the U.S. imperialists that boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and brought about the beginning of their ruin.
					
					 The Korean war betrayed the U.S. imperialists' vulnerability.
					
					 They put huge forces and equipment enough to fight a world war including even troops from the satellite countries in the war but had to kneel down before the Korean people.
					
					 Now the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces are making a last-ditch attempt to topple down Korea's socialism, far from drawing a due lesson from their ignominious defeat in the Korean war.
					
					 But they will only meet another shameful defeat before the Korean people advancing under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, adding luster to Kim Il Sung's exploits for the war victory.

articles.title: Nigerian Body Calls for Establishing Reliable Peace Mechanism on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Nigerian Body Calls for Establishing Reliable Peace Mechanism on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "Concluding a peace treaty is an urgent task that brooks no delay" on its website on July 5.
					 The article said:
					
					 Northeast Asia is a region of volatile situation where big powers stand opposed in the light of geopolitics.
					
					 Instability, neither a war nor peace, has persisted on the Korean peninsula for 60-odd years since the Armistice Agreement was concluded in July 1953.
					
					 The Armistice Agreement was scrapped by the U.S. long ago.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea urged the U.S. to correctly understand the strategic position of our Republic that has joined ranks of advanced nuclear powers, face up to the trend of the times, lift its anachronistic policy hostile towards the DPRK, replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty and withdraw its aggressive forces and war hardware from south Korea. 
					
					 It is an urgent requirement of the times to establish a mechanism for ensuring durable peace on the peninsula as it is the biggest hotspot and a theatre of nuclear standoff.
					
					 The DPRK suggested replacing the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty and has invariably made strenuous efforts for doing so.
					
					 The successive U.S. administrations, however, refused to conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK but persistently escalated tensions and staged war provocations one after another.
					
					 The approach and attitude to the conclusion of a peace treaty serve as a touchstone distinguishing the peace-loving force from the bellicose force.
					
					 If the U.S. terminates the hostile policy towards the DPRK and approaches the conclusion of a peace treaty, the DPRK-U.S. relations will see a dramatic improvement based on trust and promote peaceful development in Northeast Asia.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings took place in Ecuador, Mexico and Germany on July 6 and 7 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The chairman of the Ecuadorian Cultural Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea who is chairman of the Ecuadorian committee for remembering Kim Il Sung said that the revolutionary life of the President was one of the great statesman and outstanding leader who glorified the 20th century as an independent era with his profound ideology and theory and outstanding leadership.
					
					 The director general of the Television Station "Tele Andina 23" of Ecuador said that Generalissimo Kim Il Sung was a great man possessed of the noble personality and virtue, adding that not only the Korean people but also his family and the world progressive people boundlessly admired Kim Il Sung as a benevolent father.
					
					 The president of the Mexican Friend Association for Memory of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il noted that Kim Il Sung embarked upon the road of the revolution in his early years, founded the Juche idea and led the anti-Japanese armed struggle, the construction of a new country, the Fatherland Liberation War and the socialist construction to victory and that he developed the Korean People's Army into the invincible revolutionary armed forces and thus firmly defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Federal Republic of Germany-DPRK Association praised said that he will always be alive in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive mankind.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige el Instituto Arquitectonico Paektusan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige el Instituto Arquitectonico Paektusan
Pyongyang, 14 de julio (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Instituto Arquitectonico Paektusan.
					Recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria, la sala de conservacion de objetos historicos revolucionarios y la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					Viendo con gran emocion las fotos del Dirigente dirigiendo el Instituto, el Presidente dijo que en todos los historicos preciosos esta reflejada condensadamente la historia de direccion del Dirigente quien dedico todo lo suyo al desarrollo de arquitectura autentica.
					
					Al margen de la direccion del Dirigente quien dedico gran atencion a la preparacion de las bases de creacion e investigacion arquitectonicas como el Instituto e ilumino la direccion del desarrollo de arquitectura jucheana, no pueden pensar en la gran era dorada, la de gran prosperidad de la construccion de hoy, subrayo y agrego que no debemos olvidarnos para siembre sus proezas.
					
					Recorrio la exhibicion de los exitos de ciencia y tecnica arquitectonicas, la sala de estudio de diseno arquitectonico, la de estudio de datos informaticos y otros lugares y presento las tareas que se le incumben al Instituto.
					
					Destaco que los funcionarios, disenadores, arquitectos e investigadores del Instituto deben armar firmemente con la original idea arquitectonica y estetica y la politica de construccion del PTC y librar una energica lucha por crear las obras arquitectonicas materializadas estrictamente la caracteristica jucheana, la nacionalidad, la originalidad y la modernidad que se brillaran eternamente junto con la epoca del Partido del Trabajo.
					
					La arquitectura es el arte de alto nivel y, al mismo tiempo, deviene un indice importante que muestra el nivel de civilizacion y el poderio del pais y la nacion, dijo y continuo que los disenadores y los arquitectos deben asegurar satisfactoriamente en maximo nivel los disenos que describen el proposito de construccion del partido y los ideales del pueblo, llevandose la noble conciencia de ser pintor y floricultor que dibujan y cultivan el radiante futuro de la patria socialista.
					
					Subrayo que los disenadores, los arquitectos y los investigadores tienen que rechazar cabalmente la semejanza y la repeticion en el diseno arquitectonico y esforzarse activamente por edificar mucho y excelentemente los edificios salubres, verdes, de energia cero, de carbon cero y multifuncionales.
					
					Destaco que el Instituto debe prestar gran atencion a las labores para elevar la proporcion de usar los materiales de acabado con las materias domesticas, realizar la diversificacion y multicolorizacion de los materiales de construccion, desarrollar el nuevo dominio en la agricultura, mejorar el talento de creacion de los disenadores y arquitectos y acumular mucho mas los datos referentes a la arquitectura del mundo.
					
					Al decir que hay que modernizar aun mas los medios de diseno del Instituto, agrego que el partido le dara los ordenadores ultramodernos y otros medios modernos de diseno para garantizar en el nivel alto la cientificidad, la exactitud y la rapidez de diseno.
					
					Destaco que es muy grande la esperanza del partido en el Instituto y expreso la conviccion de que los funcionarios, disenadores, arquitectos e investigadores cumpliran satisfactoriamente su mision y deber honrosos y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Le acompano el director de Departamento de Diseno del Comite de Estado, Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Representacion de EPC en Phanmunjom critica introduccion de armas pesadas en zona desmilitarizada
articles.content:
Representacion de EPC en Phanmunjom critica introduccion de armas pesadas en zona desmilitarizada
Pyongyang, 14 de julio (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, los uniformados norteamericanos ocupantes del Sur de Corea llevan a la coyuntura de conflicto y guerra la situacion de la zona desmilitarizada de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar mediante la introduccion cuantiosa de armas pesadas de diferentes tipos.
					En entrevista con el periodico Joson Inmingun concedida el dia 14 con ese tema, el portavoz de la Representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea en Phanmunjom dio la siguiente respuesta:
					
					De acuerdo con la informacion del pasado dia 10 de los medios de prensa surcoreanos, la comandancia de las "fuerzas de la ONU" sostuvo en julio de 2014 una reunion con la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor del ejercito titere surcoreano.
					
					En esa ocasion enmendo el "reglamento 551-4 de la comandancia de las fuerzas de la ONU" sobre la introduccion de armas, de modo que pudiera emplazar en la zona desmilitarizada de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar no solo las armas individuales, sino tambien las pesadas, y lo puso en vigencia desde el 5 de septiembre del mismo ano. 
					
					En virtud del "reglamento" modificado, se han introducido en gran medida en la zona desmilitarizada las armas pesadas de diferentes tipos, tales como la ametralladora de calibre 12.7mm, el canon automatico 40mm, el canon sin retroceso 57mm y el mortero 81mm.
					
					Debido a la quiebra intencional del Acuerdo de Armisticio, la zona desmilitarizada se ha convertido en la "de armas pesadas" y se encuentra en la coyuntura de imprevisible choque armado, lo cual es el resultado de las incesantes maniobras de EE.UU. tendentes a provocar la segunda guerra coreana. 
					
					Sin embargo, las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea, que usan la insignia de la comandancia de las "fuerzas de la ONU", enganan a la opinion publica justificando sus actos descarados con las sofismas que lo describen como "contramedida" al aumento armamentista de la RPDC.
					
					Comenzo hace mucho tiempo la violacion flagrante y total del Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea por parte de EE.UU. 
					
					Aun antes de que se secara la firma al pie del acuerdo, ese pais bandido comenzo a desvirtuar sus clausulas medulares. 
					
					Debido a las susodichas maniobras de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea, llega ahora a la peor fase la tension militar en la zona desmilitarizada de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar de la Peninsula Coreana, reconocida como zona mas candente del mundo.
					
					En el caso de que se introduzcan en grandes cantidades las armas pesadas en la zona desmilitarizada, esta area con el papel de amortiguacion militar resultara inefectiva y al final, se convertira en la linea avanzada para la provocacion de guerra.
					
					He aqui la intencion de los caudillos de agresion y provocacion.
					
					Para encubrir su naturaleza, EE.UU, bandido y agresor de peor calana de este mundo, suele hablar de la "observacion del Acuerdo de Armisticio" y "alivio de tension" por una parte y por la otra, trata de fomentar la confrontacion militar entre ambas partes coreanas y agravar al extremo la tension al convertir la zona desmilitarizada en la "de armas pesadas". 
					
					Es un vicio de ese pais incitar y fomentar el conflicto y rebelion internos en las naciones y paises para alcanzar facilmente su meta de agresion.
					
					Un buen ejemplo es el "traslado de sus bases militares en el Sur de Corea hacia el sur del rio Han.
					
					En complicidad con la siniestra intencion de EE.UU., los compinches traidores de Park Geun-hye estan enloquecidos por el enfrentamiento fratricida.
					
					Si los criminales tratan de tergiversar la verdad y enganar la realidad, se revelara con mas claridad su asquerosa naturaleza.
					
					El EPC esta observando ahora con una mirada penetrante los sospechosos movimientos militares de los enemigos que se dan a cualquier hora en los alrededores de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar.

articles.title: CRPP rechaza el emplazamiento de THAAD en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Representacion de EPC en Phanmunjom critica introduccion de armas pesadas en zona desmilitarizada
Pyongyang, 14 de julio (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, los uniformados norteamericanos ocupantes del Sur de Corea llevan a la coyuntura de conflicto y guerra la situacion de la zona desmilitarizada de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar mediante la introduccion cuantiosa de armas pesadas de diferentes tipos.
					En entrevista con el periodico Joson Inmingun concedida el dia 14 con ese tema, el portavoz de la Representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea en Phanmunjom dio la siguiente respuesta:
					
					De acuerdo con la informacion del pasado dia 10 de los medios de prensa surcoreanos, la comandancia de las "fuerzas de la ONU" sostuvo en julio de 2014 una reunion con la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor del ejercito titere surcoreano.

					En el caso de que se introduzcan en grandes cantidades las armas pesadas en la zona desmilitarizada, esta area con el papel de amortiguacion militar resultara inefectiva y al final, se convertira en la linea avanzada para la provocacion de guerra.
					
					He aqui la intencion de los caudillos de agresion y provocacion.
					
					Para encubrir su naturaleza, EE.UU, bandido y agresor de peor calana de este mundo, suele hablar de la "observacion del Acuerdo de Armisticio" y "alivio de tension" por una parte y por la otra, trata de fomentar la confrontacion militar entre ambas partes coreanas y agravar al extremo la tension al convertir la zona desmilitarizada en la "de armas pesadas". 
					
					Es un vicio de ese pais incitar y fomentar el conflicto y rebelion internos en las naciones y paises para alcanzar facilmente su meta de agresion.
					
					Un buen ejemplo es el "traslado de sus bases militares en el Sur de Corea hacia el sur del rio Han.
					
					En complicidad con la siniestra intencion de EE.UU., los compinches traidores de Park Geun-hye estan enloquecidos por el enfrentamiento fratricida.
					
					Si los criminales tratan de tergiversar la verdad y enganar la realidad, se revelara con mas claridad su asquerosa naturaleza.
					
					El EPC esta observando ahora con una mirada penetrante los sospechosos movimientos militares de los enemigos que se dan a cualquier hora en los alrededores de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar.

articles.title: Portavoz de entidad coreana condena actitud projaponesa de camarilla de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
CRPP rechaza el emplazamiento de THAAD en el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 14 de julio (ACNC) -- Ahora, toda la nacion coreana esta muy indignada por la conducta vendepatria de la camarilla surcoreana de Park Geun-hye que decidio introducir el THAAD, armamento mortifero de EE.UU. 
					Los habitantes de distintos estratos del Sur de Corea demandan fuertemente anular totalmente esta resolucion calificandola de "expediente de traidores de Ulsa de version moderna" que venden el poder rindiendose a EE.UU., "opcion fatal y vendepatria" y "gran calamidad que trae la mayor amenaza que la guerra a la seguridad de la poblacion". 
					
					Sin embargo, la camarilla de Park Geun-hye, autora del presente caso, se desespera por ocultar sus crimenes y eludir el rechazo interno y externo soltando las sofisterias tales como la presente resolucion "es para la defensa desde amenaza de armas nucleares y misiles del Norte" y "una medida inevitable para la seguridad y la subsistencia de la poblacion". 
					
					Revela asi el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria en una declaracion publicada el dia 14.
					
					El presente caso demuestra mas claramente a todo el mundo que Park Geun-hye es la vendepatria y sirvienta de guerra no vista que enloquecida por la confrontacion fratricida y la ambicion de agresion a la RPDC, vende sin vacilacion el destino y los intereses de la nacion y perturba hasta la paz y la estabilidad de la region. 
					
					El CRPP denuncia en nombre de toda la nacion el proceder vendepatria de la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye, rendida ante la demanda gangsteril de EE.UU., y aclara la siguiente posicion:
					
					El emplazamiento de THAAD en el Sur de Corea es el proceder conflictivo para eliminar bajo el amparo de las fuerzas extranjeras el disuasivo nuclear de la parte connacional conocido como valioso patrimonio nacional. 
					
					La traidora Park trata de ubicar a toda costa el THAAD en el suelo surcoreano, pese al fuerte rechazo de toda la nacion y la sociedad internacional a partir de la estrategia astuta de intensificar a cualquier precio la sancion y presion anti-RPDC bajo el amparo de EE.UU., al ver que se consolida cada dia mas la posicion de la RPDC como pais con armas nucleares y no surte ningun efecto su insistencia en "desnuclearizacion, primero". 
					
					Park calcula que bajo la proteccion del THAAD podria salvar su vida y el sistema de dominacion en la crisis de arruinamiento. Pero, esto deviene una gran equivocacion. 
					
					La traidora Park, autora de la resolucion del emplazamiento de THAAD, no debe olvidar ni un momento que cuanto mas se desespere por atropellar a la misma nacion bajo el amparo de las fuerzas extranjeras, tanto mas se fortaleceran en lo cualitativo y cuantitativo nuestras fuerzas armadas nucleares autodefensivas y el punal de justicia le quitara la vida. 
					
					La mandataria surcoreana, que volvio a dejar en la historia otra huella de confrontacion fratricida y sumision a EE.UU. entregandole la Peninsula Coreana como campo de guerra nuclear, pagara el precio mas horrible y mas tragico.
